about_the_game:
CHECK OUT THE EXCLUSIVE DEMO


This demo for I WILL BE THERE will let you play 5 FULL DAYS, with all features unlocked, including both NORMAL and NIGHTMARE difficulties.

The only limitations are the save system & the Survival Mode which challanges you to survive as long as you can.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes mild violence, use of blades and firearms, frightnening  figures (zombies, thugs) and pixelated blood particles.
